name: Foodball Hero
description:
Wanna score an awesome touchdown?

Run as fast as you can!

Enter fever is absolutely fun!

Rush through all your enemies although they will do everything they can to stop you!

Be an amazing team player and make an unbelievable touchdown.

Intuitive controls by tapping and once you release your finger, your character will throw the ball to your teammate next you.

Don't forget to click at the right time and choose the celebration for your victory!





Be the smartest and fastest of your friends in passing levels and increasing difficulty. One thing's for sure is you'll never put this game down!



Endless fun is only a tap away.
